Substituting the first equation into the third equation, we get 1.01B + B + G = 4500

Substituting the first equation into the second equation, we get 2.02B = 4500 - 1.01B
Combining like terms, we get 1.01B = 4500

Substituting this value into the equation R = 0.01B, we get R = 0.01(4500) = 45
Substituting this value into the equation G = 1.01B, we get G = 1.01(4500) = 4505
